resources.string:
Thank you for downloading the app.

 Description: 
this application calculates variations and combinations with or without repetition. It is calculated through formulas.

 Usage: 
In the first field type the number of total elements (=n) and in the second field type the number of chosen elements(=k). After choose what type of formula you need to use. The result (comact and full) will show below the buttons and full result is automatically copied to clipboard.
